description.en: LEVELG Token is a virtual peer to peer asset for paying transfer fees, payments and fiat exchange which deliver the latest decentralized financial technology. We believe in DECENTRALIZATION. We encourage everyone to be part of this new mindset. Being decentralized doesn’t mean we are not responsible of our duty as a nation’s citizen, but more towards our responsibility to go to the next level of freedom. Freedom to manage our own financial without any intermediaries choking us with hefty fees and additional unnecessary services.
